value.title: Beijing says Chinese citizens abroad with coronavirus symptoms should get treatment locally
value.excerpt: BEIJING (Reuters) - Chinese citizens overseas with coronavirus-related symptoms should seek treatment locally, a Beijing city government official said on Wednesday as the capital seeks to ward off a resurgence in infections. value.title: CDC: Gilead Sciences' Remdesivir Is Being Used to Treat Coronavirus Patients
value.excerpt: Several drugmakers are currently trying to find a vaccine or a treatment for the rapidly spreading disease, and arguably the leader in this race is Gilead Sciences (NASDAQ:GILD). Gilead Sciences' remdesivir -- a drug that was originally developed to treat Ebola but with little success -- is currently being investigated as a treatment for COVID-19.

value.title: Stock Alert: Tiziana Speeds Up Coronavirus Treatment; Stock Up 311.88%
value.excerpt: (RTTNews) - Shares of Tiziana Life Sciences Plc (TLSA) are climbing above 300% in pre-market today, after the company announced that it is expediting development of TZLS-501, a novel, fully human anti-interleukin-6 receptor (anti-IL6R) monoclonal antibody (mAb) for treatment of patients infected with coronavirus COVID-19 (SARS-CoV-2).

value.title: A disgraced televangelist promoted an alleged cure to coronavirus. Missouri is now suing him.
value.excerpt: After suggesting on his show that colloidal silver could cure the novel coronavirus, the Missouri Attorney General’s Office announced Tuesday that it is suing televangelist Jim Bakker as part of a larger effort among law enforcement to crack down on fake treatments for the viral illness.
